4r5Y2f0KX54.title: AutoGen UPDATE 0.2.11 | Studio UI and New Chat Update!
4r5Y2f0KX54.author: Tyler AI
4r5Y2f0KX54.description:
Hello and welcome to an AutoGen Update now on version 0.2.11.  There are quite a few updates but two that I definitely want to go over is the update for AutoGen Studio UI and a new way to chat!  Let me know what you think in the comments ü§ì

Useful Links:

https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/
https://microsoft.github.io/autogen/docs/notebooks/

Don't forget to sign up for the newsletter below to give updates in AI, what I'm working on and struggles I've dealt with (which you may have too!): 

=========================================================
üì∞ Newsletter Sign-up: https://bit.ly/tylerreed
=========================================================

üôã‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è My GitHub: https://github.com/tylerprogramming/ai

ü•ß PyCharm Download: https://www.jetbrains.com/pycharm/download
üêç Anaconda Download: https://www.anaconda.com/download
ü§ñ AutoGen GitHub: https://github.com/microsoft/autogen

üìñ Chapters:
00:00 Big Update
00:15 Small Updates
00:47 AutoGen Studio Updates
03:21 Studio Update Thoughts
03:45 AutoGen Multichat
08:19 Multichat Thoughts
08:56 AutoGen Graph Modeling
11:24 Final Thoughts

üí¨ If you have any issues, let me know in the comments and I will help you out!
